definitions.definition: A concern for fact or reality and rejection of the impractical and visionary .
An artistic representation of reality as it is.
The viewpoint that an external reality exists independent of observation .
A doctrine that universals are real: they exist and are distinct from the particulars that instantiate them.

main_definition: A concern for fact or reality and rejection of the impractical and visionary .
secondary_definitions: An artistic representation of reality as it is.
( sciences ) The viewpoint that an external reality exists independent of observation .
( philosophy ) A doctrine that universals are real: they exist and are distinct from the particulars that instantiate them.
